name: Riven Spirit Blossom | League of Legends
description:
Lora trained on Spirit Blossom Riven from League of Legends

models used

anime: CoffeeMix, PrimeMix, MeinaAlter

2,5D: GlassBones, Dark Sushi 2.5D, CamelliaMIx_2.5D_V2, MeinaUnreal - V3

realistic: fantasticmix_real

tags: spirit blossom riven, 1girl

optional tags: white kimono, white hair, single horn, hair ornament

negative embeddings: embedding:bad-hands-5, embedding:ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, embedding:bad-artist, embedding:EasyNegative

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • VAE: vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned (for realistic models & 2,5D), kl-f8-anime2, blessed2.vae (for anime models)

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras or DPM++ 2M Karras

  • Steps: 20 to 35

  • Clipskip: 1 or 2

  • Upscaler : img2img in comfyui using 4x-UltraMix_Smooth

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 9 (mostly 7 and 8)

  • LORA weight for txt2img: 0.5-1 (for the examples i mostly used 0.8)

  • Denoise strength for img2img: 0.4 to 0.7

If you want the exact same settings, just drag and drop the picture into ComfyUI

for the pictures i used comfyui
